00028 /**
00029  *              \brief  CUDA kernel for check buffer
00030  *
00031  *              \param  sharedMemory    area for exchange status information with host
00032  *              \param  nbuf                    number of buffer
00033  *
00034  *
00035  */
00036 __global__ void checkCounterKernel( long *sharedMemory, int nbuf )
00037 {
00038 
00039 
00040         TaskMonitor *ptrMonitor = (TaskMonitor*)sharedMemory;
00041         TaskBufferStatus *ts=(TaskBufferStatus *)sharedMemory;
00042         ts+=nbuf;
00043 
00044         uint64_t step = TaskCounts;
00045         int size=ts->sizeOfKBytes;
00046         int cnt=1024/8*size/step;
00047 
00048         uint64_t expect_data=nbuf*1024*size/8;
00049         expect_data += threadIdx.x;
00050 
00051         uint64_t *src = (uint64_t*)(ts->ptrCudaIn);
00052         src+=threadIdx.x;
00053 
00054         TaskCheckData* check= &(ts->check[threadIdx.x]);
00055 
00056         unsigned int totalErrorForBuf=0;
00057         unsigned int errorCnt=0;
00058         unsigned int block_rd=0;
00059         unsigned int block_ok=0;
00060         unsigned int block_error=0;
00061 
00062         unsigned int flagError=0;
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066         //printf( "src=%p  x=%d y=%d z=%d expect_data=0x%.8lX\n", src, threadIdx.x, threadIdx.y, threadIdx.z, expect_data );
00067 
00068 
00069         for( int loop=0; ; loop++ )
00070         {
00071                 if( 1==ptrMonitor->flagExit )
00072                 {
00073                         break;
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 if( 1!=ts->irqFlag )
00077                 {
00078                         for( volatile int jj=0; jj<1000; jj++ );
00079 
00080                         continue;
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 src = (uint64_t*)(ts->ptrCudaIn);
00084                 src+=threadIdx.x;
00085 
00086                 __syncthreads();
00087 
00088 
00089                 flagError=0;
00090                 check->flagError=1;
00091                 for( int ii=0; ii<cnt; ii++ )
00092                 {
00093                         uint64_t        val;
00094                         val = *src; src+=step;
00095 
00096                         if( val!=expect_data )
00097                         {
00098                                 if( errorCnt<16 )
00099                                 {
00100                                         check->nblock[errorCnt]=block_rd;
00101                                         check->adr[errorCnt]=ii;
00102                                         check->expect_data[errorCnt]=expect_data;
00103                                         check->receive_data[errorCnt]=val;
00104                                 }
00105                                 errorCnt++;
00106                                 flagError++;
00107                         }
00108                         expect_data+=step;
00109                 }
00110                 check->flagError=flagError;
00111                 check->cntError=errorCnt;
00112 
00113                 if( 0==threadIdx.x )
00114                   ptrMonitor->block[nbuf].irqFlag=0;
00115 
00116                 expect_data += 2*1024*size/8;
00117 
00118                 __syncthreads();
00119 
00120                 block_rd++;
00121 
00122                 if( 0==threadIdx.x )
00123                 {
00124                         // Check all task
00125                         unsigned int flagErr=0;
00126                         for( int ii=0; ii<TaskCounts; ii++ )
00127                         {
00128                                 if( ts->check[ii].flagError )
00129                                 {
00130                                         flagErr=1;
00131                                 }
00132                         }
00133                         if( 0==flagErr)
00134                         {
00135                                 block_ok++;
00136                         } else
00137                         {
00138                                 block_error++;
00139                         }
00140 
00141                         ts->blockRd=block_rd;
00142                         ts->blockOk=block_ok;
00143                         ts->blockError=block_error;
00144                         //printf( "buf: %d  expect_data= 0x%.8lX \n", nbuf, expect_data );
00145                 }
00146 
00147         }
00148 
00149 
00150 }
00151 
00152 /**
00153  *              \brief  start checkCounterKernel
00154  *
00155  *              \param  ptrMonitor      pointer in CUDA memory of shared data
00156  *              \param  nbuf            number of buffer
00157  *              \param  stream          CUDA stream for this kernel
00158  *
00159  */
00160 int run_checkCounter( long *ptrMonitor, int nbuf, cudaStream_t& stream  )
00161 {
00162 
00163     //Kernel configuration, where a two-dimensional grid and
00164     //three-dimensional blocks are configured.
00165     dim3 dimGrid(1, 1);
00166     dim3 dimBlock(TaskCounts, 1, 1);
00167     checkCounterKernel<<<dimGrid, dimBlock, 0, stream>>>( ptrMonitor, nbuf );
00168 
00169    return 0;
00170 }
